Getting Started with NEXUS AI

Introduction

NEXUS AI is an advanced artificial intelligence system that combines multiple specialized agents to provide comprehensive assistance across various domains. This guide will help you get started with using NEXUS AI effectively.

Quick Start

  1. Visit the Application: Go to nexus-agent.io
  2. Choose Your Agent: Select from the available specialized agents in the sidebar
  3. Ask Your Question: Type your query in the chat interface
  4. Get Expert Response: Receive specialized assistance from the appropriate agent

Understanding the Agents

NEXUS Guardian

The primary interface agent that routes your queries to the most appropriate specialist. Guardian acts as your personal assistant, understanding your needs and directing you to the right expert.

Specialist Agents

  • Builder: Construction, DIY projects, home improvement
  • Coder: Programming, software development, debugging
  • Gardener: Horticulture, plant care, garden design
  • Teacher: Education, learning, academic assistance
  • Chef: Culinary arts, cooking, recipe development

Best Practices

Writing Effective Queries

  • Be specific about your needs
  • Provide relevant context
  • Ask follow-up questions for clarification
  • Use the agent switching feature when needed

Getting the Most from Each Agent

  • Start with Guardian for general questions
  • Switch to specialists for domain-specific expertise
  • Combine agents for complex projects
  • Save important responses for future reference

Advanced Features

Context Management

NEXUS AI maintains context across your conversation, allowing for more natural and effective interactions. The system remembers your previous queries and can build upon earlier responses.

Multi-Agent Collaboration

For complex projects, you can involve multiple agents. For example, when building a garden shed, you might consult both the Builder and Gardener agents for comprehensive guidance.

Performance Tracking

Monitor response times and accuracy metrics in real-time to understand how effectively NEXUS AI is serving your needs.

Troubleshooting

Common Issues

  • Slow Responses: Check your internet connection and try refreshing the page
  • Incorrect Routing: Manually switch to the appropriate agent
  • Unclear Responses: Ask for clarification or rephrase your question

Getting Help

If you encounter issues or have questions about NEXUS AI, please visit our support page or contact us directly.

Next Steps

Now that you understand the basics, explore the following resources:

  • API Reference - For developers
  • Agent Guide - Detailed agent information
  • Examples - Real-world use cases
